reviewText: If you're a big fan of racing, whether it be rally or street- this deserves to be in your DVD collection. Great footage... High speed cornering, crashing, and spectacular sound. There's nothing much more to say about this. Do yourself a favor and buy it.
The WRC is in my mind the finest racing on this planet. I look forward to view 2008 and hope to obtain it from Amazon.

I guess i should've look for detail of the content of this dvd. but it only covered 3 locations of the wrc.  If i had known it only covered 3 locations i woulda picked the one with norway and japan.

WRC World Rally Championship Total Domination superb dvd. extensive explanations including differences in suspension setup and how they affect car behaviour, clear accounting of poroitions at every ss, great filming. also, great use of their little gizmo which shows cars superimposed on ss to allow the viewer actually perceive the time differences bewteen drivers. could not be better.
